contentencoded: Millions of Americans are slipping from the middle class, and it’s no longer certain that savvy, hard-working parents can pave the way for their children’s success. Producers Kate Ellis and Ellen Guettler share the process of chronicling the evolution of the American Dream from the Great Depression to the present day.

title: ARW Behind the Scenes: Episode 3, A Better Life: Creating the American Dream
